This is just a second screen so i could add some form of navigatio to this app but also in place of a Read.me file to allow me to explain some of my decisions. There are a few things I didn't implement in this app that I would have in a full production app. 

 Below are some of the improvements I might makeâ€¦ 

 1) I would have had drop downs for each make and model box on the search screen to show possible makes and also their associated models. I considered implementing a basic drop down option but thought it would be a lot of effort and to get any real effect I'd have to add quite a lot of make and model options. 

 2) Drop down in the year box to show all available years. I would thnk in a proper app this information would be provided through an api on start up of the search screen to show all available options. 

 3) I have not added any filters or sorting to the results etc as it was not specified in the test criteria but in a full app it would be fairly easy to set up filtering and sortign options for the results. 

 4) I added a sealed class to track the network response. I haven't added a loading enum or a progress spinner for this MVP but the sealed class allows for that sort of thing to be added quite easily later. I only added error and success scenarios to show how it would be handled.
